description: Borrowed from German Ersatz (“replacement”); and from the German ersetzen (“to replace”, verb).

adjectives.description: ersatz (comparative more ersatz, superlative most ersatz)

entries.meaning: Made in imitation; artificial, especially of a poor quality.
examples: Synonyms: artificial, faux, imitation, knock off, (obsolete) gingerbread
Back then, we could only get ersatz coffee.

entries.meaning: Something made in imitation; an effigy or substitute.
